alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 8:38PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Thomas and east central Sherman Counties through 815 PM MDT/915 PM CDT/... At 738 PM MDT/838 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brewster, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Levant around 850 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Colby. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 28 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
